The Spire of Whispers.description: Rising endlessly into the clouds, this vast tower is filled with spiral staircases and high, arched windows. Whispers of half-read stories drift through the air, a chorus of encouragement and warning. It is a place of quiet study, candlelight, and the comfort of hearthfire.
The Spire of Whispers.benefit: Associated Buffs: The Candlight Study, The Cozy Hearth, Head in the Clouds. (Earn x2 Ink Drops from these buffs)

The Verdant Athenaeum.description: Nestled within an enchanted forest, this living library sprawls with vines, glowing blossoms, and winding paths. Birds flit through the rafters, and every step seems to awaken the rustle of leaves eager to share their secrets. Here, wisdom is nurtured in the embrace of nature itself.
The Verdant Athenaeum.benefit: Associated Buffs: The Herbalist's Nook, The Soaking in Nature, The Soundscape Spire. (Earn x2 Ink Drops from these buffs)

The Sunken Archives.description: Buried beneath dunes of shifting sand, this ancient library is a labyrinth of collapsed halls and half-submerged chambers. Scrolls crumble into dust, guarded by spectral archivists who watch intruders with owl-like intensity, reminiscent of Wan Shi Tong's eternal vigilance. The air is thick with the weight of forgotten knowledge, daring you to unearth it.
The Sunken Archives.benefit: Associated Buffs: The Soundscape Spire, The Wanderer's Path, The Excavation. (Earn x2 Ink Drops from these buffs)
